name: Tank Tread
description: Tank Tread is a multiplayer real-time strategy game with modern military units.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) / AMD A10 5800k (3.8 GHz) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) / Radeon HD 4890 (1024 MB) Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7-950 (3.0 GHz) / AMD FX-4300 (3.8 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 770 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB) Storage: 8 MB available space
